mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM USER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USER_UID, PASSWORD, NAME, BIRTH, GENDER, PHONE, AUTHORITY) VALUE (#{USER_UID}, #{PASSWORD}, #{NAME}, #{BIRTH}, #{GENDER}, #{PHONE}, #{AUTHORITY})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET PASSWORD = #{PASSWORD}, NAME = #{NAME}, BIRTH = #{BIRTH}, GENDER = #{GENDER}, PHONE = #{PHONE}, AUTHORITY = #{AUTHORITY} WHERE USER_UID = #{USER_UID}

choose.when: SELECT * FROM USER WHERE REPLACE(USER_UID, '', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SERCH_KEYWORD}, '%')

SELECT * FROM USER WHERE REPLACE(PHONE, '', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SERCH_KEYWORD}, '%')
